name: SokoBank
description:
Push the coins into the piggy-banks!

Controls:

  •   or    to move
  •   to undo your last move
  •   to restart the current level

Key:

  - A coin. Store it in your piggy-bank.
  - A piggy-bank. Ideal for coin storage.

 - Roman numerals. These appear on coins and piggy-banks. Piggy-banks will only accept coins of matching value.

Created with PuzzleScript
